titleStmt.title: The Kentish petition to the Honourable, the Commons now sitting in Parliament: the humble petition of diverse well-affected in the county of Kent, the city and county of Canterbury, together with the Cinque Ports, in the behalfe of themselves and others.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Hanna Allen, at the Crown in Popes head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Thanks the House for annulling the votes of those who would yield to the King. Prays that he be speedily brought to justice -- Cf. Steele.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Crown in Popes head Alley
